description: s3Dgraphy connections datamodel including edge types with CIDOC-CRM mappings

is_before.name: is_before
is_before.label: Chronological Sequence
is_before.description: Indicates a temporal sequence where one item occurs before another.

has_same_time.name: has_same_time
has_same_time.label: Contemporaneous Elements
has_same_time.description: Indicates that two elements are contemporaneous.

changed_from.name: changed_from
changed_from.label: Temporal Transformation
changed_from.description: Represents an object that changes over time.

has_data_provenance.name: has_data_provenance
has_data_provenance.label: Data Provenance
has_data_provenance.description: Indicates the provenance of data, often linking to extractor nodes or combiner nodes.

contrasts_with.name: contrasts_with
contrasts_with.label: Contrasting Properties
contrasts_with.description: Represents contrasting or mutually exclusive properties.

has_first_epoch.name: has_first_epoch
has_first_epoch.label: Has First Epoch
has_first_epoch.description: Indicates the initial epoch associated with a node.

survive_in_epoch.name: survive_in_epoch
survive_in_epoch.label: Survives In Epoch
survive_in_epoch.description: Indicates that a node continues to exist in a given epoch.

is_in_activity.name: is_in_activity
is_in_activity.label: Part of Activity
is_in_activity.description: Indicates that a node is part of a specific activity.

has_property.name: has_property
has_property.label: Has Property
has_property.description: Connects a node to one of its properties.

extracted_from.name: extracted_from
extracted_from.label: Extracted From
extracted_from.description: Indicates that information is derived from a particular source.

combines.name: combines
combines.label: Combines
combines.description: Indicates that a node combines information from various sources.

is_in_timebranch.name: is_in_timebranch
is_in_timebranch.label: Included in Timebranch
is_in_timebranch.description: Indicates that a node belongs to a specific time branch.

has_timebranch.name: has_timebranch
has_timebranch.label: Connected to a Timebranch
has_timebranch.description: Indicates that a node is connected to a specific time branch.

has_author.name: has_author
has_author.label: Has author
has_author.description: Represents the connection of a node with its author.

has_geoposition.name: has_geoposition
has_geoposition.label: Has geoposition
has_geoposition.description: Represents a connection with the geoposition node of a given node

has_linked_resource.name: has_linked_resource
has_linked_resource.label: Has Link
has_linked_resource.description: Connects a node to its linked resource(s)

has_representation_model.name: has_representation_model
has_representation_model.label: Has Representation Model
has_representation_model.description: Connects any node to its representation model in 3D space.

has_semantic_shape.name: has_semantic_shape
has_semantic_shape.label: Has Semantic Shape
has_semantic_shape.description: Connects any node to its semantic shape representation in 3D space.

is_in_paradata_nodegroup.name: is_in_paradata_nodegroup
is_in_paradata_nodegroup.label: Belongs to a Paradata Node Group
is_in_paradata_nodegroup.description: Indicates that a node is included into a paradata node group.

has_paradata_nodegroup.name: has_paradata_nodegroup
has_paradata_nodegroup.label: Is connected to a Paradata Node Group
has_paradata_nodegroup.description: Indicates that a node belongs to a paradata node group.

generic_connection.name: generic_connection
generic_connection.label: Generic Connection
generic_connection.description: Represents a non-specific connection between two nodes.

isInstanceOf.name: isInstanceOf
isInstanceOf.label: Is Instance Of
isInstanceOf.description: Connects an external 3D model reference to its instance in a scene.

isInstancedAs.name: isInstancedAs
isInstancedAs.label: Is Instanced As
isInstancedAs.description: Connects an external 3D model reference to its instance in a scene.

associatedWithEpoch.name: associatedWithEpoch
associatedWithEpoch.label: Associated With Epoch
associatedWithEpoch.description: Associates a visual model with a specific time period for temporal visualization.

positionedAt.name: positionedAt
positionedAt.label: Positioned At
positionedAt.description: Specifies the spatial positioning of a representation model.

represents.name: represents
represents.label: Represents
represents.description: Indicates that a semantic shape represents a specific stratigraphic node.

applies_to.name: applies_to
applies_to.label: Applies To
applies_to.description: Indicates that a license applies to a specific node or set of nodes.

restricts.name: restricts
restricts.label: Restricts
restricts.description: Indicates that an embargo restricts access to a licensed resource.
